Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary decision: Assign a specific worker to a specific task.

Name: include_feature_in_sprint
Description: Binary decision: Include a specific feature in the current sprint backlog.

Name: select_user_story_for_release
Description: Binary decision: Mark a user story for inclusion in the next release.

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: The duration of a sprint in days.

Name: assign_story_points
Description: The number of story points assigned to a specific user story.

Name: team_size
Description: The number of workers assigned to a specific team.

Name: worker_availability_factor
Description: A multiplier for a worker's nominal availability (e.g.

Name: task_effort_estimate
Description: The estimated effort (in person-hours) for a specific task.

Name: blocker_severity_score
Description: The severity score assigned to a identified blocker.

Name: feature_priority
Description: The priority ranking of a feature (higher = more important).

Name: stakeholder_influence_weight
Description: The influence weight of a stakeholder in satisfaction calculations.

Name: skill_proficiency_level
Description: The proficiency level of a worker for a specific skill.
